gg.al.util

Class AudioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gg.al.util.AudioManager

  • public class AudioManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Thomas Neumann on 27.04.2017.
    AudioManager class, used for registering Sound and Music and controlling the volume of registered sounds and music.

    • Constructor Summary
